name: Pixadex Icon
summary: Learn about .PIXADEX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Pixadex, which was developed by The Iconfactory, was merged into the CandyBar software.

description: Icon image file used by CandyBar and other Pixadex-compatible icon applications; stores multiple images at varying resolutions (i.e., 512x512, 256x256, 128x128, etc.); used for applying custom icons to the Mac OS X operating system.
